title: Anne
review: I have nothing but positive things to say about Varo. I absolutely love this bank!! They are there for the people who literally live from paycheck to paycheck and cover for me if the need be. Every other bank I had stole so much of my money from me!! It actually sickens me to calculate the expenses that they sucked from me in overdrafts and even extra overdraft fees on top of the $35 every single time I needed them to be there for as a valued customer who banked with them for years. Not once in 10 years did they help me. The worst part is I now know how badly they treated me by holding my money for weeks at a time holding back my government benefits every month for 10 years. It‚Äôs unethical and wrong to treat anyone that way charge me an overdraft fee when you have had my money when I needed it most and charged me over and over and over the figure comes up to several thousand dollars when I actually saw what they had so unfairly done to me by switching to Varo holy cow praise Jesus they have treated me more than fair and I will always give VARO praise. Thank goodness you showed me what the old bank had been doing to me I am so glad I switched to Varo they are the best bank and their customer service over the phone is outstanding. Like I said in the beginning I have nothing but praise to say about this bank Varo is the best bank I ever had!!!! VARO ROCkS

title: Best there is. Love VARO.
review: I switched to VARO almost 4 years ago. I got fed up with my two other brick and mortar banks (that I only went into twice in 15 years). Got tired of the attitude and delays in doing anything with them. I could never understand how they could bugger things up when my banking needs were really very basic and simple. I picked VARO over several other online banks because they were polite, helpful, and everything happens faster than my other bank. The transition from VARO money to VARO bank has been painless. My daughters and two of my friends have switched to VARO. VARO suits my needs perfectly. I don‚Äôt use much cash, don‚Äôt deposit many checks, direct deposits are posted 3-4 days early. The few checks I have posted through the app processed quickly and without any issues. The few times I‚Äôve needed cash, they have ATM access just about everywhere. The app and Home Screen widget are great.  Only bank I‚Äôve ever dealt with where I haven‚Äôt found a single thing to complain about, or had a single problem.  The only real semi-issue I have found is if a payment requires a bank cashiers check, banks won‚Äôt issue one wo an account in their bank, but I found the places wanting cashiers checks can be talked into money orders.

title: Going on 3yrs
review: I‚Äôve been using Varo since 2018, and it‚Äôs pretty cool. I‚Äôve also banked with Chase, IBC, and MidFirst. A physical bank comes in handy if you‚Äôre living paycheck to paycheck and need that money on your card that day. Varos‚Äô answer; if you have direct deposit then you can get paid early like with other popular apps. So that‚Äôs even better. And if you‚Äôre not in a rush you can just take a picture of the check and it‚Äôll be in there the next day of the week. And you can deposit cash by green dot cards. But the customer service is better than any other bank I‚Äôve had. And I‚Äôve yet to run into any issues. They are also always ontop of the new. They were one of the first to get the cards you can just tap like Apple Pay etc. idk I‚Äôm easy going so this bank works out well for me. And the early pay is cool. If you need a bank I‚Äôd recommend this Forsure. If your bank is troublesome or anything switch over. If it‚Äôs not then only switch if you need to get paid earlier

title: Nothing but ongoing issues since they switched to Varo Bank
review: Since Varo received their charter to become a bank there has been nothing but ongoing issues with them ever since. From glitches with activation to account glitches, swiping your card and paying for items glitches, weird account error message glitches...I got annoyed with it all and moved my DD back to Chime temporarily hoping that maybe one day Varo will get it together and I would potentially switch back. I did leave my account opened to deposit and cash checks via mobile deposit. They used to have a great turn around time with that. I have been using this service for over a year or two. Well now they are slacking in that area also. Banks make their money based on how much funds you hold in your account at the end of the day. So you would think they would be doing everything they can to keep their customers happy. Hmph not this bank. It was fine when they were Varo Money. I don‚Äôt understand why they chose to switch over. It‚Äôs been nothing but chaos ever since. I‚Äôm to the point where I am so disappointed with these folks that I am about to close my account completely. I gave them the benefit of the doubt. I gave them many chances and months to redeem themselves. I‚Äôm so disappointed especially after speaking so highly of their services. It‚Äôs very saddening and very unfortunate.
developerResponse: {'id': 21488728, 'body': "Hi Nacita! Our goal here at Varo is to provide the best mobile banking experience possible. We were sorry to hear your experience has been anything but extraordinary. We just reached out to you via email, let's continue the conversation there!", 'modified': '2021-03-06T22:58:32Z'}

title: Why did you take away so many useful things?
review: This app is worse than the original app. You should have kept the old one. I shouldn‚Äôt have to open the app to view my updated balance. The old app would let you see your balance via notification if you spend anything. Also when you make a transfer from savings to checking or visa versa there is no notification at all. You guys took one step forwards and 10 steps back. When someone send you money via Zelle for example, still no notification saying the money is received as well. You have to log in and wait to see the funds. It use to be almost instant with the old app. This update was the worst thing you guys have done. I was ok with updating my direct deposit and all those other things, but not giving the user proper notifications is not good. I need to be able to see what goes in and out of my account, and I see other reviews saying the same things.  Why change something that wasn‚Äôt broken? At least keep the useful things. It‚Äôs useful to be able to view your current balance after you spent some money without having to log in completely. Whoever took away these features should give me their job. You had one job. One job. Now I need to find another bank.
developerResponse: {'id': 19864311, 'body': "We're really sorry to hear you're upset about the switch to Varo Bank. As we've just received our national banking charter, this enabled us to become a bank where we can now offer our own accounts along with other new and improved features. Varo Money accounts are provided by The Bancorp Bank so the switch is necessary and the debit cards are not interchangeable. However, we hear your frustrations and your feedback is taken very seriously as we know there is room for improvement. We're sorry that this experience has led you to consider banking elsewhere but please know that lots of new, great things are to come with Varo Bank. You can see the difference between Varo Bank and Varo Money here: https://www.varomoney.com/varobankmigration/ -- if you have any questions or further concerns for us, please reach out to us at appreview@varomoney.com! We're here and happy to help!\r\n", 'modified': '2020-12-19T01:36:40Z'}

title: Horrendous deposit limits that competitors don‚Äôt have
review: Came for the high interest yield savings (like most people) and cancelled my account within a month. Would‚Äôve cancelled sooner but I wanted to give the bank a chance. It‚Äôs the 1st of December and I still haven‚Äôt received my funds and it‚Äôs been over three weeks since I cancelled. Customer service‚Äôs feedback was ‚Äúthey‚Äôre escalating it and they‚Äôre not sure a check was even issued...‚Äù.I still don‚Äôt have my money which I saved for Christmas shopping and I don‚Äôt even know when I‚Äôll get it. To be more specific Varo has ridiculous limits (like tiny limit i.e $50) for the amount you can deposit into your savings from an outside institution. You can avoid the limit if you originate the transfer from the outside institution but many banks charge a fee for doing that. Ally bank, a direct competitor, doesn‚Äôt have any limits or restrictions like that. Essentially Varo tries to get you to utilize more of their services like their checking account (obligatory checking account by the way). They want you to get automatic deposits too, for example, and in return they will increase your deposit limits. On top of everything they made the cancellation process a nightmare. There are so many better options out there. Stay away

title: Great banking, non-existent customer service
review:
I‚Äôve been a member of Varo for 2 years, and have to say that since it‚Äôs become Varo Bank, getting through to customer service seems impossible.
With the old Varo, I had nothing but excellent customer service. They always answered the calls or emails. I‚Äôve been trying to get through to customer service for a week now, but no luck üòë
I start calling each morning at 8:00 when they open for business. There‚Äôs no wait time mentioned then, but no one answers. I‚Äôll wait for an hour, then am told by the automated system that the wait time is less than 15 minutes. Um, no. It‚Äôs more like an hour. I don‚Äôt stay on beyond that. When called after 10:00 am, the estimated wait time is ‚Äú greater than 60 minutes ‚Äú.  Ugh. I just want to find out some important ( to me) information about a direct deposit that seems to be floating around in my old account. Emails aren‚Äôt answered either. 
Their inefficiency has become my problem, and there‚Äôs no way to get in touch. 
I hope someone from Varo bank reads this and makes it right. I don‚Äôt like being disappointed in Varo!
developerResponse: {'id': 21743902, 'body': 'We‚Äôre very sorry for the long hold times recently. We‚Äôre currently experiencing extremely high volumes. We understand the importance of contacting customer support and are eager to assist with your request. We appreciate your patience during this time. Please remain on the line or contact us at appreview@varomoney.com!\r\n', 'modified': '2021-03-19T00:26:35Z'}

title: Do not use this bank!
review:
I opened an account in March with Varo for their interest rate to help grow my savings. Made a few initial depots and pretty much just left it like that. Then, a few weeks ago I was notified that my account had been closed. No reason, no notification beforehand that anything strange was going on. ‚ÄúWe will email you in 2-3 business days,‚Äù was their only comment. Attempts to log in on the app and website were met with an alert that my account was locked. 
A week went by with no contact from them. Couldn‚Äôt get through via the automated customer support because my account number couldn‚Äôt be found. Finally, after being disconnected several times and spending actual hours on hold, a human told me that she was ‚Äúelevating my case‚Äù and that someone would get back to me via email within 24 hours. Again, nothing. 
So far, it has been two weeks and I have yet to receive any communication from Varo. My account is closed, I have no access to the funds I had deposited, no way of contacting anyone who can actually help me, and I still don‚Äôt even know why any of this happened. 
Zero stars for communication and customer service. I just want my funds back so I can put this terrible bank behind me.
developerResponse: {'id': 23214188, 'body': "Hello! It's always a difficult decision to close an account. We regularly verify financial activity to ensure we keep our whole community safe. In rare cases, it may be necessary to close an account. With that being said, we'd still like to look further into your concern. However, are unable to locate an account for you. We ask you kindly to reach out to us at appreview@varomoney.com.", 'modified': '2021-06-05T23:08:30Z'}

title: Fast and Efficient
review: I was really surprised by VARO‚ÄôS ease of use and absence of unnecessary stuff. I don‚Äôt expect much from online only banking platforms, I guess because of the abundance of them. Throughout the past year however, on lock down, and now transitioning  back to work, transactions that go through VARO move very fast and the security system is completely reliable without being as over the top as some of the competition‚Äôs, which, despite having an account for over two years (with one service in particular) and having used the same device for banking for nearly a year, requires my full web login and 2-factor authorization, on TOP of biometrics. VARO also had a feature that will cover you if you‚Äôre in a jam. When I needed $50 and just didn‚Äôt have it on me, I launched VARO and set up a loan in about 2 minutes.

title: Fraud issue time
review: Everything has been smooth sailing no issues until I had to report my account for fraud I  had to freeze my account so now I have no access to it until fraud department contacts me and I‚Äôm being told it can take 2-3 days my opinion fraud issue should be taken care ASAP and you talk to someone the same day to start a report most banks you do talk to someone immediately but this bank is making me wait  .  I have field a police report and still haven‚Äôt filed a report with the bank except freezing my account to stop anymore money coming out so no access to money at all and they don‚Äôt seem concerned when this is your main account and have a family to provide for they expect you to wait for them for god knows how long.. bills don‚Äôt freeze nor do day to day expenses.   I just think these issues should be handled right away and not have to wait days for a phone call .   I am not the suspect I am the victim that someone stole a large amount of money from my account it wasn‚Äôt just a little .
developerResponse: {'id': 21436631, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about your experience and would like to take a look into this for you! Unfortunately we were unable to locate your account by you Apple ID. Please email appreview@varomoney.com and we'll be happy to assist you further! ", 'modified': '2021-03-04T03:20:15Z'}

title: 1 star too many
review: I have been using Varo Bank for about a month now. The first two weeks went fine, no real issues. I got all of my funds transferred into their bank, and then they froze my account, stating that there was a problem with their system that should be cleared up by the end of the day. So I waited. 2 days later, I still have no access to my money. I call again, each time with over an hour hold time. I get another rep that tells me the same thing, almost word for word like it‚Äôs memorized. You‚Äôll have your funds by the end of today, tomorrow at the latest. I wait a couple more days, spend an hour and a half on hold. Same memorized speech. I‚Äôm leaving for a work trip in an hour with a $20 bill and a prayer that they will fix it so I can get home. My mortgage is past due, bills are stacking up, and all my money is controlled by Varo. After explaining this to the rep, he just hung up on me. I‚Äôm completely at a loss here with no money, and now am seeking legal action to obtain my funds and close that account. Oh yeah, I can‚Äôt even close my account, did I mention that? This company has cleaned out all of my funds overnight, and I‚Äôve had it. Stay away!
developerResponse: {'id': 23276078, 'body': "Hello, we're sorry to hear about your experience and would like to take a look into it, ASAP! We're unable to locate your account with your username, so please send an email to\xa0appreview@varomoney.com\xa0so we can assist?", 'modified': '2021-06-09T02:40:56Z'}

title: Missing funds
review: Yesterday afternoon I cash out money from my cash app to my Varo debit card and went to check my account and the money was NOT THERE ! Then Varo posted on the same day that they are experiencing technical issues with app and your balance might not be correct. I waited all day for the issue to be resolved and it wasn‚Äôt. I called Varo this morning and spoke to a representative and she tells me the supervisor is taking care of the problem and I should receive a email by the end of today about my funds and my account. Remember, this has been like this since yesterday and yesterday was my birthday. If I was really dependent on this money or had a emergency I would have been screwed because of Varo issues. Once this problem is resolved, I will deactivate my account Varo and move on to a better company. Varo was a great app to use til the New Varo debit cards came out and the new Varo app. Varo you have officially lost a long time customer because of lack of communication and the long waiting period for my funds to be shown on my account. I will NOT recommend Varo to any friends or family.

If you have any additional questions or concerns, please feel free to contact our support team by phone or email at support@varomoney.com. ", 'modified': '2020-12-09T19:30:03Z'}

title: I wish I could love it like I used to
review: I‚Äôve been with varo for almost 3 years and loved every minute of the experience with the old Varo money!, every notification, the customer service, and of course timely direct deposits. Imagine my surprise when I crossed over to the ‚ÄúNew & So called Improved‚Äù Varo bank :(.. I don‚Äôt get none of my notifications anymore for my transactions and that‚Äôs a huge thing for me. Not knowing when things come or go and then dealing with Calling customer service, being on hold for hours, just to be told ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not sure why your notifications are not working, but they should be‚Äù.. DUH!!, I know they should be but for whatever reason ever since crossing over to this new bank, everything has taken a downfall which made me start moving my money back to my chime account. Please get it together Varo so I could come back to you. I‚Äôm obviously not the only experiencing this because if you look at other reviews other users have the same problem!!, New customers may not have this issue, but people who‚Äôve had to transfer over surely do!!! Please fix this

We're here and happy to help!", 'modified': '2021-02-12T14:01:17Z'}

title: Soo disappointed and MAD
review: Before they switched I never had a problem! I am a Varo user for years! Mid last week, I actually ran into a problem where I felt my account was compromised, I called them, and they froze my account for potential fraud. Ok that‚Äôs fine. That was on Wednesday. It is not the following SATURDAY and I still have NO ACCESS to my money. I have called EVERY DAY waiting on hold for nothing under an hour..Thursday once I got thru the call ‚Äúdropped‚Äù so guess who had to stay on hold another HOUR!?. I have bills to pay and no access to MY MONEY. I keep hearing ‚ÄúI‚Äôm so sorry...fraud will contact you‚Äù. I have gotten 1 email from them and that‚Äôs it! This is crap. And the only way to reach someone is by email? I‚Äôve emailed support and ‚Äúfraud‚Äù so many times I‚Äôm sure they know my name by heart now. I‚Äôm tired of this and I need my money. It‚Äôs not fair...it has been 10 days and bills are due. All of my money is frozen like art on a wall...this is ridiculous. After this whole situation and the way it‚Äôs handled, I‚Äôm considering pulling all my money once it‚Äôs open again and closing this account. I‚Äôm totally disgusted....

Please reach out to us for further support at appreview@varomoney.com. ", 'modified': '2021-03-14T20:51:31Z'}

title: It's Pretty Cool
review: My bank currently closed after many years, so I was forced to find another provider. Varo is pretty close to my previous simple account, and they have all the features you could want in an account. I just wish a few extra items were tweaked in there. Such as transaction search by name. And the ability to earn interest on anything over $5k in savings. For some reason, my Varo account also does not work with a few service providers, such as Paypal (as a bank account - it only accepts the debit card number), Target RedCard (to make payments), Earnin app (to receive), and a few others. I find this all highly inconvenient, and its unclear why these connections don't work. I also don't appreciate the limits of deposit or the fact you make me write "check for deposit with varo bank only" but then refuse a check because the person who gave it to me cut it off too fast and the edges aren't 100% perfect.
developerResponse: {'id': 22517351, 'body': "We appreciate you for taking the time to leave us your honest\xa0feedback! We understand the inconvenience so know that your\xa0feedback\xa0was taken seriously and that we've informed the necessary team. If you have any further concerns and/or questions, please reach out to us at\xa0appreview@varomoney.com!", 'modified': '2021-04-28T19:24:19Z'}

title: This is honestly "VAR-Out" dudes!
review:
Simply put, it's no hassle and a great main, or even back up, checking / checking + saving account based platform. Works as advertised and is as painless for me as they come. I have yet to have any issue with the service for over a year, I believe atleast a year if not two, and it's come in very handy on numerous occasions. Plus the straight forward "fee's (or lack thereof) and interest rates" are pretty nifty. 

Keep up the great service and I'll keep my eyes peeled for maybe some cool new features coming in future updates *hint *hint lol (but honestly, my only recommendation would be that we get to see you folks additing some cool new twists, bells, whistles and even small touches, even if for a test run. It's that extra special spice that keeps a service like Varo feeling just as fresh, and down to earth, as it was on day one.)

title: Love it!!!
review: Varo has made banking so much easier for me. I‚Äôm able to get all my banking done in no time and I never have to make any extra trips to the bank I also love that I don‚Äôt have to any monthly fees for my account ever which is a must for me why should anyone have to pay a bank to put money in it? When my card was stolen they had me a new card in the mail the same day I reported it stolen plus made sure all the transactions were mine as well and there was no charge for a new card like most online banks I‚Äôm looking forward to using the new app and card hopefully it just adds to the good job they are doing. So far Varo has been a good choice for me and my already busy life I tell all my friends and family about it and recommend it to anyone looking for a new bank.

title: The Next Best Thing to Chime
review: Chime seems to beat out Varo at everything except the savings APY. I‚Äôve been using Varo with direct deposit for about a month now. I do get my paycheck almost 6 hours earlier in the day than I did using chime so that‚Äôs a plus. But chime‚Äôs app design is better, offers credit builder credit card, and has support chat in the app. Honestly the only thing that I don‚Äôt like about this bank is that their app is so boring and simple. The GUI is about as simple as it gets. Grateful they included a balance widget at least for the Home Screen . I‚Äôm not extremely concerned though because Varo is a reputable bank but just created this new app to switch to a better banking system so I can‚Äôt to wait see what the future has in store for Varo. Please keep your customers satisfaction the number one goal for this bank and it will be better than chime.

title: Was a customer for 3+ years
review: Overall I was very happy to have had VARO, they were a lifesaver in that particular moment in my life and I stayed with them through everything since, I‚Äôve had some issues a few times with transactions and they solved my problems quick and were very helpful everytime. Also always linkable and convenient. I have recommended them to at least 50+ people in the time I had them...now I would have given 5 stars, if it weren‚Äôt that they closed my account 2 days ago...apparently in the user agreement, the account is not to be used as a business account and I had my SBA loan deposited to this account...they told me that it violated the agreement which was terms for account closure..it‚Äôs unfortunate...but I would still recommend this bank...just don‚Äôt have an SBA loan deposited to it.

title: Terrible Bank‚ÄîAVOID
review:
This outfit has a a shambles. They have major engineering issues with their banking systems that will cause your balance to never be correct. You have to call then to get your money, and you better be prepared to wait on hold for hours and hours to speak to someone. It‚Äôs terrible!

You can dispute transactions, like you can with any bank, but they will not communicate to you at all throughout the process. Radio silent. If they have 2 months and 3 days to resolve a dispute, you better believe they will take exactly that amount of time to get you your money back. 

Oh but loath he who takes an advance, because they will remind you daily that you owe them money!

Their customer service agents are all weirdo Mormons from Utah. When one of them finally gets on the line and puts the phone to their ear, all I can hear is the ocean. Thick as two short planks. Some of the stupidest people I have ever spoken to.

They will shut your debit card off randomly and leave you with no way to access your money to feed your kid. They will send a card in the mail, make you wait two weeks for it to show up, with no   Way too access your money, and the card never shows up! They never send them!

If you have to close your old account to transfer to their new bank app, lord help you. You‚Äôll never get all your money out of your old account, and they don‚Äôt care. You‚Äôre on your own. 

These reviews are all fake!

title: Perfect
review: Varo Bank is an amazing financial institution that has so many perks that go alongside it. The interest rate for your savings account has great profit opportunities. You can see your account information, plus withdrawal and deposit information. Easily transfer money between different banks. No fees like other cards, and I get my check 2 days earlier than my pay date. I‚Äôve been using this bank for a decent amount of time, and wanted to make sure my review was accurate and not just some random 1 day user. I don‚Äôt plan on going anywhere with Varo. Oh, and they also have this tool that will fill in the blanks for your direct deposit information, and you can print it out and hand it to your employer.

title: Most under- rated banking app!
review:
I love the fact that Varo is an online banking service. 
There are no ridiculous fees. I don‚Äôt have to worry about getting to the bank before it closes, because they have several open-late locations. Transferring money to my partner for bills has never been easier, and the app itself is really easy to navigate- all the information needed is where you‚Äôd expect it to be, no more hunting down account details or struggling to find transaction history. The Varo customer service has been more than dedicated to helping me with a multitude of things, and are always so friendly whenever I call. 
I recommend Varo to everyone who is considering a switch or even just a new bank.

title: Bad
review: Been having quite a lot of issues with this app ever since they switched to a bee version of the app. I had $700 in my account and couldn‚Äôt pay for gas or buy groceries for a few days, luckily I had another bank. In the past when I had issues with my car it was just a phone call and a few options to choose, then speak with someone and I‚Äôd be able to have my issue fixed. Now there‚Äôs way more options to go through and I haven‚Äôt been able to speak to any one. And now some has hacked my account was moving money through it illegally. I luckily only had $5 left in there since I took everything out, but it jumped to $50, then $30 then $80 and then $12. I wish I took a photo of it but with so much going on it my life I forgot. I want to cancel my account with them but they won‚Äôt answer my calls. Never using this app again, there‚Äôs Lilly and real banks and BoA and chase so that‚Äôs good

We are unable to locate an account using your Apple ID. Please reach out for additional support at appreview@varomoney.com. We are happy to help. ", 'modified': '2021-04-04T18:36:28Z'}

title: so many ridiculous changes
review:
if we and most of the customer decided  having an account with Varo it was cause offering simplify all the trash and charges of the other  banks impounds to customers. 
But every time Varo is changing and not for better  more security  it is good but very restrictive for example I living in the border with Mexico when i cross the border the app stop working  sending e mails and they ‚Äúdoesn‚Äôt know why‚Äù - international transactions now are charged - ATM getting % more high in commission.  transactions get duplicated informed that to the email and phone customer service  they responding weeks later saying it was nothing wrong  it fine and charged. so it means i can‚Äôt complain.  very sad see a good bank  becomes in an other ‚ÄúMONEYlittle secret fees collector‚Äù like the other banks are and  WE the customers who believed who helped and are helping make this big Bank NOW  goes to end in the priority list.

title: Love it
review: This has really been a great bank for me so far. The app is up-to-date, and they are still a growing bank and I look forward to seeing their new products as they come out. The only drawback recently has been due to the pandemic with lower federal interest rates so their savings account perks have dwindled a little bit but in my opinion they‚Äôre doing their best with what they have. For example their 2.8% savings cap used to be on $50,000 and then lowered to 10,000 and now it‚Äôs 5000 here recently but they increased the percentage from 2.8 to 3. So it‚Äôs definitely a good savings account for somebody that‚Äôs just starting their savings. Hey Varo! Increase your savings cap back to where it was when you can, please! Lol

title: Worst bank
review: Had Varo set up autopay on their end and once my due date arrived. Loan balance has decreased after autopay kicked in, but some sort of glitch occurred. The amount due hasn‚Äôt deducted from my checkings account, but every time I make a purchase, the push notifications displays a whole different amount. Notifications and in app balance show different balances‚Ä¶ called and waited two decades for them to answer and it‚Äôs been over a week, they still haven‚Äôt fixed it!!!! But WAIT THERE‚ÄôS MORE‚Ä¶. Recently I experienced a unauthorized charge and filed a dispute‚Ä¶ No provisional credit was given and will take nearly 2 weeks to receive my card compare to other banks‚Ä¶. Like I have bills to pay and they expect me to call back every time I need to make a payment or withdraw money‚Ä¶. Currently I have to wait greater than 60 MINUTES IN ORDER FOR THEM TEMPORARILY ACTIVATE MY CARD and withdraw money (im waiting by the atm for them to answer)‚Ä¶. THESE ARE THE PERKS OF NO FEES BANK!

title: Customer Service is abysmal.
review: I never leave reviews on apps or services, no matter how bad. But I felt the need to put it out there. This bank‚Äôs customer service is AWFUL. If you need to change anything minor about your account, it takes multiple emails and/or multiple forms. Need support by email? It‚Äôll be 3 days minimum before you hear anything. Rather get support by phone? Be prepared to spend 45 min up to an hour waiting to talk to someone. Emails are scattered and half the time don‚Äôt answer the original question. I cannot recommend strongly enough for people to AVOID THIS BANK. The extra services they provide are cool but they do not have the bandwidth to support customers if something goes wrong. So, if you sign up... just hope nothing goes wrong with your account. They‚Äôll deactivate your account - no warning, no phone call, nothing. Only a 7 day warning to move your money somewhere else.

title: New, but not exactly improved
review: I‚Äôve had Varo for years and I have absolutely loved it up until this transition to the new app and cards. My husband and I have both had issues with the new debit cards not reading at various places, the app is unreliable, notifications can take forever and some charges sit there pending for an extremely long time, and the new account number doesn‚Äôt want to connect to Venmo. There‚Äôs also apparently a fee now that Varo charges for using an atm, IN ADDITION to the atm fee that you already have to pay the machine. Switching all of my payment information was annoying but that would have been understandable. The debit card issues have been the biggest problem though, to the point that I think we will have to switch to a more reliable bank. I‚Äôm really sad about it because until now Varo was easily the best bank account I‚Äôve ever had.

title: This is a real review.
review: Guys do not get chime.  My work does not offer direct deposit so I could not really do anything with chime.  I made a chime account three days ago and I woke up today and it was suspended. They claim that I already had a account and now have to send them my identification documents to prove myself.  I decided to look online for similar mobile apps and I found Varo.  Instantly it was easy to make my account and get everything set up in less than five minutes. Also on chime it wouldn‚Äôt let me transfer money from my local bank savings account to my chime.  VARO LETS ME DO THAT.  I love this App, absolutely outstanding!  Wish I could give you guys ten stars and a donation!

title: No help until fraudulent charges are posted
review:
I was happy with Varo until I suddenly had 4 charges from the Philippines post in 5 minutes. I immediately called customer service, and (after a good while on hold) was to,d nothing could be done until the charges showed as posted and were no longer in pending status. When I had a similar issue at PNC, they immediately refunded the charges to my account while they investigated, so my bills would still be paid. Not the case with Varo, so I will be returning to PNC. Very disappointing. Oh, and estimated hold time is 60 minutes, adding insult to injury.
***UPDATE*** Once I finally got through, the rep was helpful, and it only took a few minutes to file the dispute. Looks like I should be able to transfer funds from this account to my PNC account and use that card for funds. I guess if you have no other account, your money is just held hostage for a couple of weeks.

title: This is one messed up outfit
review:
Any of the pluses for doing business with this bank you can get from other banks with way less haste. 

The $50 overdraft is a joke. Even if you pay it all back, it‚Äôs unavailable until the transactions that overdrew your account settle. I have never had a bank do this.

My money frequently disappears and reappears a day or two later. I am pretty sure they take more than they show you when you use your card at a place that involves a tip. They won‚Äôt show you a running balance, so verifying this requires starting at your last statement balance and doing the math of all your transactions to see what they are shorting you. Really dishonest. 

If anything happens to your card, you lose it, they think it maybe compromised, they will shut it off immediately and make you wait two weeks for a new one to come in the mail. There is no way to access your money while they are doing this.

The wait times when you ah e to call in are ridiculous. They cut off my card for fraud and I had to sit in hold for two hours to try to pay at 7 eleven.

If you have to do a charge back, they won‚Äôt communicate with you at all through the process. No one will get on the phone with you and if you do speak to someone they will make you feel like a criminal when you‚Äôre the victim.

Just choose another bank!!

title: New App, New Problems
review:
Like many other reviewers, I am not thrilled with the transition from Varo Money to Varo Bank.

One of the biggest appeals of Varo is the high interest rate for their savings account. Unfortunately, when I transitioned to the new app, all of my accrued interest for the month of December had disappeared.

I called customer support to figure out the issue, but waited on hold for 30 minutes with no answer before deciding to give up. I ended up sending an email and am hoping they can resolve the situation that way. 

I know transitions like this can be rocky and I‚Äôm hopeful for Varo‚Äôs future. If I get my money back and their customer service improves, I will make sure to update my review. But for now, I‚Äôm not happy and am definitely starting to look into other online banks.

EDIT:

Updated my review from 2 stars to 3 stars after the response from the developers below. However, this was not at all clear and should not have required leaving a negative review to get an answer. Additionally, I still have not received an official email response from Varo‚Äôs customer service team which is very discouraging.

Again, I like certain aspects of Varo and think they have potential. But they‚Äôre off to a rocky start with this transition.

title: This app and bank is a CON - SCAM ALERT
review: Beware!!! I have over $3000 in this bank. I NEVER received a debit card. As soon as they had my money they lowered their interest rates almost immediately. Then they required you to activate your new debit card in order to access your account. I never received a new debit card from them. Calling their customer support line sends you on a round robbin asking for the last 4 digits of the debit card that I never received. The app requires you to activate your debit card to access it. The old app sends you to the new app. The customer support email simply tells you to update the app (my app is updated to the most recent version) and ignores the rest of what you are saying. I have been trying to get access to my money for months to no avail!! This is insane! I have never had an FDIC insured bank handle my money like this. I simply have 0 access to my thousands of dollars!!

title: üôÑüôÑüôÑ
review:
Within the first month of using this bank I was already unimpressed. I was drawn to Varo for their impressive ~0.8% APY (October-Novemberish 2020) and the potential ~2.8% if you meet the requirements... but since then, they have recently limited the previously $10K max balance (to receive 3% APY) to $5K, and otherwise lowered their general APY 0.2% (!!! such a low APY savings comparatively to other high yield savings account banks). IMO, it‚Äôs just trash for what you get out of it. You have to put in too much effort to try to get 3% on a max of only $5K. üôÑüôÑ 

Not to mention the actual worst part is that when you‚Äôre trying to transfer money to the bank the transfer limit is only 200 DOLLARS. Which you can only transfer every 4-5 days after the previous transfer clears!! So if you‚Äôve got a few grand to throw in there, stay hydrated cuz it‚Äôs gonna take a few weeks. 

Just use a better, easier bank.

title: Top of the food chain
review:
Will it remain at the top is the real question.... I sure hope so. The customer service side of the business is great.  The app is very easy to use and quite user-friendly, which is essential while targeting this type of audience on the business side of things. I hope things only get better as more doors open and technology advances, Varo slips it‚Äôs foot in door and releases updates and advanced features in the app that others in the industry (the competition) falls asleep on and doesn‚Äôt quite catch up. 
I think Varo Bank is just scratching the surface of its potential and excited, I am, to be sitting shotgun along for the ride!

title: Great APY % but they need better mobile deposit, increase changes
review:
I‚Äôve been with Varo for years and they would have 5 stars, however they need better customer service hold times. If you call customer service you are on hold for 1-2 hours regularly. If you lose your bank card it takes 7-10 days.

If you‚Äôre looking for convenience and way faster customer service please keep a Wells Fargo bank account, TD, BOA or chase, etc! For this part alone I would highly consider going back to regular bank. I was very interested in the Online banking, however I can honestly say the traditional banks are still a much better way to go. Even if I had to go to a branch I would have access to funds immediately instead of waiting almost 12 days for my replacement card to be increased.

title: Good luck if u need to talk with someone...

Hmmm... didn‚Äôt have to produce those pics to start the account with varo.  Wait time was ‚Äúover an hour‚Äù.  They replied to my complaint online, saying it (hold time was temporary).  19 of April, again, heard ‚Äúyour wait time is over one hour.‚Äù All I wanna do is change my cell phone number!  What if I had a deposit that never showed up?  What if I need to dispute a charge on my account?  Look at other reviews, that‚Äôs what ppl are saying about varo. So good luck to you if you decide to bank with these guys.

title: Great. But needs work
review: It‚Äôs the fastest and least frustrating banking app I‚Äôve ever used. Transfers are fast, I love their direct deposit offers. I just really wish they would fix their customer service. You have to type in your entire social security number before you even talk to a human being. My card got declined at the store and it took minutes just to hear the robot tell me which number to press, then I was on hold for minutes on end and ended up having to just leave the store. This is just one flub, I think they‚Äôre doing a great job. It is now my main bank

title: Best to worst...
review: Varo WAS the best bank I had ever dealt with until they decided this new Varo Bank would be their future. Old Varo I could transfer to my other accounts in 1 business day, now it takes 4. Old Varo paying for gas, the instant hold of $75 would be reimbursed after the final total, now I have to call support and hold for over an hour to get them to refund the money.  Flat out, Varo Bank is not even close to what they had. Not to mention changing accounts and routing numbers will have consequences in the future if more stimulus payments are sent out as they aren‚Äôt planning on keeping those accounts open forever. AVOID this bank for now, maybe they will get it together eventually but I can‚Äôt continue to be on hold for an hour each time I need to purchase gas.
developerResponse: {'id': 22150147, 'body': 'Hello! ACH transfers initiated into your Varo account can take up to 4 business days to post. ACH transfers out of your Varo Bank account into an external account can take up to 2 days. The timing can decrease with time as you continue to build your transfer history. The higher gas authorizations can be avoided by paying inside instead of at the pump. Gas station merchants do this to ensure there are enough funds on the account but the authorization should fall off shortly. We completely understand your frustration being on hold for a long amount of time. This is temporary as volumes have increased. Our team is working as fast and efficiently as they can and are eager to assist! Feel free to contact us at appreview@varomoney.com with any other questions or concerns! ', 'modified': '2021-04-09T13:25:05Z'}

title: CRIMINAL ACT
review: I have had two different direct deposits setup with my account for about a year. One of the direct deposits was diverted to Bancorp instead of the now Varo Bank. Now I have been told told they don‚Äôt know where my money is located and asked me to get some bank trace ID. I spoke with Anneka. I told her the bank had no right to divert my money elsewhere. They didn‚Äôt ask me if they could. I am not going to do work for the Bancorp. If I did they would have to pay me. It took over 6 hours over 3 days to get a person on the phone! I sent email 5 days ago. Never got a response. How is this a bank?! They have to know who requested my funds be diverted. I would know if I was in house. This is a breach of ethics. If I had someone‚Äôs funds diverted into my account it would be called criminal. I want my money. NOW‚ÄºÔ∏è

title: Horrible User Experience
review:
Their original app was terrible. Sometimes it would take minutes after initiating a transfer from savings to checking before the fund became available to transfer elsewhere. Somehow the funds only became available after a push notification came through. I tried opening a support ticket and replied a few times but they never seemed to understand the problem.

Now they are making us move to completely new accounts which requires changing direct deposit info and debit card info everywhere. There‚Äôs no explanation of why this was necessary or how it will benefit customers and it‚Äôs a terrible user experience.

If it weren‚Äôt for the high interest savings, I would never do business with this company again.

title: Seemed cool until I saw some features gone
review: For starters I guess if some new users switched over it will no longer recognize anyone you did transfer money to until they upgrade to new app and stuff which is odd but anyway. The other problems I am seeing there is no way to adjust save your change or pay in the options anywhere let alone the Mail a check feature is gone when that was very useful when I had to Mail something out. If these features don‚Äôt get fixed soon I‚Äôll consider leaving Varo as much as I loved how it was before the new stuff doesn‚Äôt seem as impressive. Please fix before I leave

We're sorry that you're not satisfied with the switch to Varo Bank but know that we hear your frustrations and your feedback completely. There's always room for improvement and we'll be sure to run this back to the appropriate teams. Thank you!", 'modified': '2020-12-16T15:19:27Z'}

title: Varo
review:
Customer service is non existent. Maybe ok if you have direct deposit. I use mobile deposit and it takes a ridiculous amount of time to get a normal payroll check posted to my account. If you have a problem set aside a few hours to spend on hold. When you get to talk to someone don‚Äôt get excited. They will not be able to correct their own mistake. It will have to be turned over to someone else. Who might or might not fix it. 
I have been with them for 3 years and have enjoy up till 2021 now I have had nothing but a horror show. Taking as much as a week to get my money. Thank god I am able to put necessities only charge card otherwise I might starve. 
I am finding an alternative so should you. 
I‚Äôm going back to brick and mortar.

title: Varo is great
review: Can send money pay  bills with ease and it‚Äôs new contactless card looks swell. Only thing we need now is to cash our checks with a picture like the other bank apps. I hate loading money to it now my job doesn‚Äôt offer direct deposit. I don‚Äôt mind the fee just hate goin to the store to cash the check then load it. Maybe you guys can add that on an update. U can sure cut the middleman out and collect my $20 for cashing my check instead of your bank only getting $5 n the check cashing place $15 ...

Varo offers a mobile check deposit feature that can be found right inside\r\nthe Varo app. \rIn the Varo bank app, tap Move Money > Mobile Check Deposit > Deposit a Check, please let us know if you have any other questions or concerns! \n', 'modified': '2020-12-17T17:36:32Z'}

title: Varo
review: Been banking with Varo for years but with the new bank it‚Äôs been a headache. First I do nog receive deposit notifications & the debit notifications will literally come days later at times (yes the app is updated & the notifications are on). This and the fact that some places do not accept the card/routing & accounting info for recurring payments. I was told it‚Äôs something with the account/bank not being official long enough. Which is a pain because since the conversion it looks as if this is a fresh account that was just opened vs showing that the account has been open for over 4 years. Possibly may have to check for a different bank due to the many troubles with this account.
developerResponse: {'id': 20194906, 'body': "We're really sorry to hear you're upset about the switch to Varo Bank. As we've just received our national banking charter, this enabled us to become a bank where we can now offer our own accounts along with other new and improved features. Varo Money accounts are provided by The Bancorp Bank so the switch is necessary and the debit cards are not interchangeable. However, we hear your frustrations and your feedback is taken very seriously as we know there is room for improvement. We're sorry that this experience has led you to consider banking elsewhere but please know that lots of new, great things are to come with Varo Bank. You can see the difference between Varo Bank and Varo Money here: https://www.varomoney.com/varobankmigration/ -- if you have any questions or further concerns for us, please reach out to us at appreview@varomoney.com! We're here and happy to help!\r\n", 'modified': '2021-01-05T14:42:06Z'}

title: Worst customer service ever!
review: This review is coming from someone who has used Comcast spectrum Verizon all of the big customer service screw off companies who just don‚Äôt care about you I‚Äôve called to ask questions several times speak to a supervisor whatever it took to find out one why you changed my deposit timing and two figure out exactly what it would take to get back to the status I started at did I get any help absolutely not did I get treated like I was completely and totally bothering their customer service team I definitely did I will be switching away from this bank immediately there‚Äôs no hard facility that anyone can go into a brick mortar store it‚Äôs just overall Terrible to deal with and I‚Äôm done with them
developerResponse: {'id': 23007583, 'body': 'We are very sorry to hear that your experience with us has been less than satisfactory. We never want you to feel this way, as we are here to help you! Regarding your direct deposit timing, it ultimately depends on your payer (your employer or a government agency). Sometimes, that could mean they sent their payroll file on a later date and/or time than last time. So, if it takes longer than last time for your deposit to hit your account, it means your employer sent payroll files to the Fed later than last time. As a result, we get the files later too. Rest assured, we will release the funds as soon as we receive them. We hope that if you are ever in need of assistance that you reach out to us at support@varomoney.com, our team would be more than happy to assist you! \r\n', 'modified': '2021-05-25T18:38:41Z'}

title: Love the service, app need improvement.
review: I loved the simplicity of the old Varo app, this new loading screen takes too much time compared to the old, this recently new font is hard on the eyes and don‚Äôt match the rest of the apps. Varo doesn‚Äôt work with a lot of service and that‚Äôs a bummer because I do all my major banking with Varo, we need the option for a more simple card, this purple design is better than the last but still too ‚Äúflash‚Äù we want something simple like cash app cards. Also it would be cool to have a cash back option like Discover and Amex. You guys are def going in the right direction and I‚Äôm here for it! ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: I enjoy my bank account
review: I have been with. Are since the Beta testing. I am now on with a new account and card. I am able to do everything I need to do with my account and some without leaving my bed if I have to. It connects to cash app, mobile check deposits are quickly processed, plenty of free ATMs, and a great savings account option as well as overdraft and payday advance. I love it here. App is easy to navigate and I just appreciate it here. Simple yet reliable banking that goes above and beyond. Here‚Äôs to the future.

title: Great Bank, Love The Features
review: I‚Äôve been with Varo for over a year and love the new app and design. Super sleek and very user friendly. Sure they‚Äôve had some hiccups when switching over but everything seems to be in good shape and I can‚Äôt say I‚Äôve ever had a bad experience. Their customer service is always incredibly helpful and friendly and always go above and beyond to assist. I can‚Äôt wait to see what features lie ahead. Hopefully some credit building options or metal cards! Either way, I love Varo. Keep up the good work guys!

title: Reliable, well built, thoughtfully designed
review: While it isn‚Äôt the newest and it doesn‚Äôt have the edgiest features, Varo‚Äôs features (such as the advance or the savings account that‚Äôs built in) are all very thoughtfully designed and well built. I appreciate the attention to detail and the concern for privacy. Plus that 3.0 APY interest rate on savings is fabulous! Love Varo! I consistently choose them over flashier competitors because their app and their features actually do what they‚Äôre supposed to do, consistently, and well.

title: 1/5 Stars
review: Back when it was Varo Money, Varo was absolutely superb. Now that it's transitioned to Varo Bank, this is the WORST banking experience of my entire life. I've had to call, email, and submit documents just to have my mobile deposit released in a somewhat timely manner. In my opinion, having your funds released to your account after you receive your NEXT check is unacceptable. I've been with Varo for 2.5 years now, depositing the same paycheck the entire time. Now that they're a "bank" versus "money service", I can't say that I've been happy even once. Every customer service representative I talk to tells me something entirely different than the last. Overall, would absolutely NOT recommend anyone use this bank.

title: Terrible
review: Absolutely terrible. The app is consistently glitching. The only way to activate your debit card is through the app. So if you are unable to login, which happens frequently, there is no way to access your money or use your debit card. Customer service is equally as terrible. Expect to be on hold for 30-60 minutes anytime you need to call with a problem, in which I guarantee, you will run into a problem with this bank. Security? There is none. I had blatant fraudulent activity on my account and Varo did not contact me with a warning or anything. Then it took over a month to receive my new debit and over a month to get my money back. I would not recommend this bank at all and I will be canceling my account.
developerResponse: {'id': 23088076, 'body': 'Hello! We are awfully sorry to hear you have had trouble reaching an agent. We have faced higher than normal call volumes, but are working quickly to resolve this issue. At Varo we follow banking laws and government regulations about how we operate. We take every precaution to keep the entire Varo community safe. Further, we do certainly provide to you other ways of activating the debit card. Follow the link to find out how!  \n\nhttps://faq.varomoney.com/hc/en-us/articles/360050199271-How-do-I-activate-my-Varo-Bank-Visa-Debit-Card-', 'modified': '2021-05-30T18:11:17Z'}

title: Okay for the most part
review: I for the most part love the bank! They work with me, customer service is one of the best! Yet sometimes there are delays with transitions beings taken out of my account with leaves me over drawn and confused! I‚Äôm grateful for no fees for when it happens! But I blame myself fo not keeping a better record of when I spend money! I love Varo! Please keep up the great work! I have been having my girls sign up for accounts as they get old enough as they love the app, the cards and the early access to their fundsü•∞ü•∞

title: I can‚Äôt even sign in
review: I received my new debit card and tried to activate it got all the way to authenticate my account and it signs me out and tells me there‚Äôs an internal server error and I received an email stating that all of my funds from my old account will be switched to my new one on the 22nd and  I can‚Äôt even activate my card because I can‚Äôt sign in.I am going to have to withdrawal all of my money because I won‚Äôt be able to have access to my funds. I try to call customer service and every time I‚Äôm waiting for 2 hours or more to talk to someone this is ridiculous how can you expect you‚Äôre customers to switch over to a broken app? I have loved Varo over the years but this has not been a good experience So far.

title: Great, wouldn‚Äôt even consider going back to the greedy big banks.
review: I get my check 2 days early every week at the same time. I put some of my money in a savings account now for reasons other than so I don‚Äôt get charged for my checking and if something goes wrong my account isn‚Äôt - $355 or whatever because of automatic payments and I was layed off. The fact that I can‚Äôt go in a bank building hasn‚Äôt been an issue at all. ATMs are everywhere if I need cash. Best banking move I ever made.

title: Interest rate calculation is off
review:
The new app is ok, slightly better GUI than the previous one. Visual design leaves something to be desired but I can get over that. 

That all said, ever since moving to the new app, I‚Äôve found that I now have to qualify every month for the higher interest rate (as opposed to losing it if you had a month where you didn‚Äôt meet the criteria). But even worse, here we are in the middle of March, I had a qualifying direct deposit on March 3rd and five debit card swipes by March 5th and I still have the lower rate (and yes, I‚Äôve kept my balance before the threshold the entire time). What gives?

title: Love Varo
review: Varo has been the best bank I‚Äôve ever had and I even waited several months before I made a review. I pulled money out of my cash app and it took them a while to put it in my account so when it did pop up I realized they put more in my account as a ‚Äúcustomer service gesture‚Äù. Needless to say that‚Äôs all it took to make me a loyal customer. I‚Äôm used to banks screwing me over with overdraft fees, not customer service gestures. I‚Äôll be banking with Varo as long as they continue to be as good as they have been!

title: Going downhill, frustrating
review:
-no joint accounts, so if anything were to ever happen to me it would be an added difficulty for my husband to access OUR funds
- savings rate has been chopped so many times since I opened an account about a year ago, I think it currently is less than a quarter of what it had been, although I know some of that is not Varo‚Äôs fault 
- no I don‚Äôt want a checking account and in the past I just did not activate the card but now there is no such option
- I agree with other comments that money transfers are much slower than other banks I use
- you‚Äôd be better going with a local bank, that provide more [basic] functions such as adding your spouse or not forcing a debit card on you.

title: Varo is absolutely the best!
review: I have been with Varo about a year now and I could not ask for a better bank. There are no monthly fees and they don‚Äôt charge a dime for overdraft up to $50! This feature has saved my life! Only one time, I have had to call to talk with someone. unlike most places you went on hold all day I actually spoke to customer service immediately and resolved my problem within two minutes. I recommend Berry bank and only very bank to anyone!!

title: What all banks should be
review: I was slow to realize how good Varo actually is, but trying to get customer service elsewhere made me wake up to how great the customer service agents were at Varo....and that Varo even had humans on hand would have sufficed as a marked improvement in and of itself!  But, it's the fact you can deposit cash, get an advance, easily transfer to savings, and other features that I had really taken for granted, but not many others offer with such ease.

title: Great online banking!
review:
It‚Äôs easy to use and never have to worry about running to the bank! I can deposit checks right through my phone, paychecks are direct deposited and I get paid two days early. 
The only negative I have is when you use an out of network atm, you are charged whatever amount the atm costs, and then you are charged $2.50 by Varo. I wish they had more atm locations they were in partnership with to make that part a little easier, or not charge that much for an out of network atm:

title: Can‚Äôt use everywhere
review: So I‚Äôve used Varo for a few years now, they‚Äôre great aside from one big thing which is that a few places don‚Äôt accept their cards/accounts for recurring payments/deposits. So far I haven‚Äôt been able to use it on the Robinhood app, two gyms, annnnd state UI (which was weird because my tax refunds were deposited into the account just fine). Not sure why some places don‚Äôt accept it, but I might have to start looking at other banks if it isn‚Äôt resolved soon. Which is unfortunate because I like the bank, but I really don‚Äôt see a use in it if I can‚Äôt use it everywhere.
developerResponse: {'id': 20122917, 'body': "We appreciate you for taking the time to leave us your honest review! The Varo Bank debit card should be accepted virtually anywhere where Visa¬Æ is accepted. However, there are some exceptions when traveling outside of the US. If you're having trouble with the Varo Bank routing number, we can assure you that the routing number you have, 124303201, is a valid routing number. Varo Bank's RTN has been active in the federal database since 8/1/2020. You will need to follow up with your employer's HR/payroll department (or external bank/institution) in order to have them update their list of routing numbers to include Varo Bank's RTN. If you have any questions, let us know at support@varomoney.com. ", 'modified': '2021-01-01T20:04:12Z'}

title: Do not use Varo
review: I‚Äôd give 0 stars if possible... Please do not use varo, I thought they were a great bank to use and liked getting paid early but beware they are the worst bank I‚Äôve ever dealt with. Always takes over an hour to get anyone on the phone and they shut my account down for absolutely no reason and wouldn‚Äôt give me any type of explanation as to why they did. But then they accepted a direct deposit from my workplace after the account was already shut down and closed. It‚Äôs been over a month and they have still yet to send my refund check to me of the remaining balance of my account. DO NOT USE VARO. Run away from them. Take my advice and use a brick and mortar banking location.
developerResponse: {'id': 22560435, 'body': "It's always a difficult decision to close an account. We constantly verify financial activity to ensure we keep our whole community safe from fraud. If you feel this action was taken in error, please send an email to support@varomoney.com, and our service team would be happy to take another look.", 'modified': '2021-04-30T20:54:33Z'}

title: Varo
review: I was with y‚Äôall when y‚Äôall was just Varo. Today I made the switch to this. I love how I still have both accounts. My cash app was able to successfully set the bank up using my routing and account numbers. I love using you guys. First online banking app and I recommend you guys to everyone. I am able to even access my school funds with no problems. I wished we had customizable cards but other than that I love the company and plan to be here a while.

title: Slightly disappointed
review: I have recently discovered the bill pay option with the Varo app before you guys became Varo Bank. I like banking with you guys because I get my money so much earlier than the traditional banks. The one thing that kept me from giving you a five star review was the fact that the new app does not have the bill pay option. I think that is an important option to have especially for your customers that are either on fixed incomes and or don‚Äôt have access to paper checks.

title: Error Message on login
review: Have had no issues with Varo till the switch over Please fix this Error message ‚ÄúError this data couldn‚Äôt be read because it isn‚Äôt in the correct format.‚Äù on login I get this error message about 99% of the time I try to login in. Also please Re-add a widget for varo like the old app so I can see my balance without having to login constantly. Thanks in advance.

Keep an eye out for app updates!", 'modified': '2021-03-11T21:07:00Z'}

title: Varo is a great bank!
review:
I've been with Varo for a couple of years and really like it. I didn't have an issue with the transfer, but I know other people have, the only thing that bugs me is that notifications don't have current balance info. Having to wear masks makes it a real pain to have to go into the app to check my balance (I have facial recognition on my iPhone), I really appreciated the "your current balance is $xyz" on the old app. 

Other than that, I don't have any other complaints about the switch.

title: Varo Banking A Winner
review:
I love this bank I have had zero problems with it and if support is needed  I have found them kind courteous and always have an answer.  The only problems I have found are depositing cash and the limits set.  Age of Acct of previous bank should play a roll in determining limits on deposits.  The second filtering of data for
Reporting. That is more of a personal need than anything if they come up with a business Acct  it would be complete.

title: Hands down best banking experience I‚Äôve had
review: Been with Varo for just about over a year and they‚Äôve been far and away the most positive banking I‚Äôve had the app is intuitive and getting my direct deposit 2 days earlier has been a life saver. Depositing physical cash would be my only hang up since I‚Äôve only been able to do it at places where they charge a fee but being that most of my transactions are paperless it hasn‚Äôt been a big deal

title: Varo
review: This new varo is what I‚Äôm talking about. My credit isn‚Äôt great and no other mobile bank app will give me 1 $ even in credit. Varo gave me 50 and I think it goes to 100$ I would give 5 stars but I can‚Äôt seem to add money to my cash app through cash apps add money icon when varo is linked as bank and debit. That and id like to buy Bitcoin as cash app offers. Other than those issues I loved varo before the new and improved app now I‚Äôm not sure how to say it. Anyone should get an account if they use any mobile banking.

title: Loving Varo Bank
review: I love Varo Bank and the Advances it gives is a better advancement than chime, chimes advancement isn‚Äôt able to give you real money but instead you can just spend more than you have. Which I prefer getting the money because I could transfer it to my savings account or to another account if I wanted, so much more than just spending more than I had. The only thing I want Varo Bank to have is a really awesome Credit Card.

title: Don‚Äôt bother
review: I have been using Varo for a while. The first problem is when the app does not open. I can‚Äôt see my account information nor do anything. Contacted customer support but that was no help. Took two weeks before I could do anything. Luckily I have a second bank I could use. And now that they have changed to this new app I can‚Äôt activate my new card. There is no option but to call and the wait was over an hour. I feel that there should be at least more than one way to activate the new card. And now I can‚Äôt use my old card due to some issue when trying to activate my new one. I‚Äôve given this company all the patience I could but I‚Äôm closing this account.

title: Worse

title: Avoid Varo
review: Use a standard reputable brick and mortar bank if you can.  Varo engages in a lot of questionable business practices, and the customer service is absolutely terrible.  One of those unethical practices is snatching money out of a customer‚Äôs account during a transaction and holding the money for an unreasonable number of days before rightfully and legally releasing the money back to the customer that never should have been held by Varo in the first place.  If Varo is doing this to all of their customers, I wonder how much Varo is earning in interest on this unethically held money.  It is also an insult to their customers intelligence for Varo to think their customers will not recognize this as an unethical business practice.

title: Varo
review: It‚Äôs better than most no monthly fees have multiple places to load money at or you can transfer it with Venmo or cash app their customer support is the best and they‚Äôll walk you step by step if they need your help only thing that‚Äôs bugs me is when I got my stimulus check it was on the first varo then they came out with the 2nd one and I had to get a new card but at least they are making better improvements in there app

title: Worst customer service I have ever seen.
review:
The bank is ok since there‚Äôs no customer service but once you need something it‚Äôs like pulling teeth. They‚Äôll make you wait hours on the line to only disappoint you when they don‚Äôt send you any attachments or even the wrong one!. This has happen three times for one ticket. I can not tell you to now downloads this app or even make a account with them.

Had customer service get in contact with me: saying they would
Like to help. Called and still waited for 2 hours!! And they still sent the same document. Which has the wrong information. I wouldn‚Äôt consider closing it if by the third time they would get it together.

title: The switch
review:
The transition between Varo money and Varo bank has been smooth... I really don‚Äôt like how the new app is set it‚Äôs not user friendly...I‚Äôve been finding it difficult to see all my transactions desposits and purchase. The push notifications are very slow take anywhere from 10min to and 1hr before it notifies you off a purchase. The old app was instant. 
My apps the Varo was attached to ie earnin, Dave, branch and albert now don‚Äôt support the new bank and that‚Äôs frustrating 
Been with Varo for years and I love it don‚Äôt wanna leave..just please make the app more user friendly
developerResponse: {'id': 21481084, 'body': " Hello. Our goal is to make banking easier for our customers. We're sorry to hear we missed the mark for you. We'd love to hear more about your experience. Would you please reach out to us at support@varomoney.com?", 'modified': '2021-03-06T01:20:34Z'}

title: VARO IS COOL!!!
review:
I get nervous and highly uncomfortable in large crowds - especially waiting in some long line, knowing at the end, I have to deal with some stranger. Yes, medication does help BUT, banking online is a dream come true for me. Been with VARO for just over a year now and I can do EVERYTHING on my iPhone that I used to have to do inside a branch of either BofA or Chase. 
If you‚Äôre anything like me, or just looking for a convenient, hassle free, FEE FREE way of banking, just download the app! Thanks, VARO! :)

title: Love Varo
review: It‚Äôs just simple and it‚Äôs easy to move cash around. The Savings are always applying as you spend! creating virtual friendly interaction for improving financial habits. They do hold return payments if you use the card Hotel/ Rental payments up to 7-10 days before it posts back to card. I just experienced it, but the customer service agent was excellent and she help me with my the refund issue, currently being resolved. I‚Äôm happy for now:)

title: Wont help get $$ back when charge unauthorized
review: Ive had varo for some time now and never had any problems. I am a pretty active spender and in being so, someone was able to make charges with my card without me knowing. When I did finally realize, I spoke with multiple reps, had my card cancelled, sent emails, etc., and within a few days received an email saying they would not be crediting my money back. Which is absolutely ridiculous. When someone uses your card fraudulently, your bank is supposed to help you get your money back. Now I am told I will need to appeal my own bank! Which I will be doing and closing my account. Choose any bank but varo
developerResponse: {'id': 22285144, 'body': "We're sorry to hear about your situation. We take fraud very seriously, and our disputes experts thoroughly investigate all claims. Varo strictly observes federal regulations and industry standards around disputes. Please send additional documentation to support your claim to support@varomoney.com so we can get started on the appeal process with you!", 'modified': '2021-04-16T13:26:55Z'}

title: No overdraft saved me!
review: I had an automatic purchase set to come out and forgot to transfer funds. I got the notification that my purchase felt and was happy to see I didn‚Äôt have a 35 dollar negative charge for making a mistake. Plus paying you sometimes 2 days early is freaking awesome not to mention how quickly it can receive funds from an outside account unlike most credit unions. I‚Äôm glad I got it. Thanks Varo

title: Do not bank here
review: No cash deposit (fees), no paper checks and they are lowering they apy, I been waiting for about 1 hour to speak to someone. Transfer limited to $200, really? That is nothing!!!!! Limit spending a day is not your money, they have a cap too. Too many no no no. Check around for better options. I am telling you, what really make think about quit here is, no branches (I know it a digital bank) but wait for over an hour to speak to someone??? Really? I am not gonna wait that long when I have an issue. I am so glad I just put $10 to ‚Äútry it out‚Äù. Glad to find it is not worth it at all. I wish someone told me to do not bank here. Too many no no no here

title: Stay away - lie to you and don't honor commitments
review:
Stay as far away from Varo as you can. I signed up through a promotional signup offer, and after a month of trying to work with them and getting the run-around, I am done. Varo has lied to me at every turn, takes weeks to respond, and refuses to honor its commitments even when I provide proof I have met the terms of the agreement. They actually agreed I met the terms but still refused to honor the agreement. 

In my opinion, this company is using fraudulent bait and switch tactics to gain customers under false pretenses and gain access to our private information. If I could give 0 stars (or preferably negative), I would. Stay far away.

title: Best bank ever!
review: I‚Äôve been a member of Varo When they were first called Varo Money, since I was 18! I loved how you can get your pay up to 2 days early, and I am glad to be a part of Varo Bank now! The new app is amazing to use, but I do wish we still have the Suggest a Feature option to allow the community to help Varo add new features that we would be interested in, but other than that 15/10 would recommend Varo Bank!!!

title: Absolutely worst customer service to date.
review:
Varo has been giving me issues ever since their transition to Varo Bank. I've tried to activate my debit card ever since they sent it to me. The card does NOT activate and I cannot get into my account. 

When I get to tried to call their support line it took 2hrs to get ahold of a real person. Clearly this was not a normal issue so I need someone to do something about. I finally get someone on the line and he's helping me. POOF the line disconnects. There was 0 attempt from Varos end to call me back. I was back to square one. 

I decide to email their support as my next attempt. I tell support my issue and they give me a canned response to activate my card through the phone or through the app. Obviously through the app doesn't work. So I call again. Guess what..it tells me to activate your card through the app. Thanks Varo. 

Just another fintech forgetting their mission statement after becoming an evil bank. Honestly... I would get better service at a traditional bank.

title: Customer service
review: Everything has been fine until Varo up and changed not only account numbers but also the routing number, which has cause a few problems with my direct deposits, but I‚Äôm very great full varo has been accepting the deposits and transferring themüèÜ But for the first time since I‚Äôve had this account (I‚Äôm talking years) I can‚Äôt get a CSR on the phone and I really need help with a particularly tricky situation. Other than that I‚Äôm loving these early deposits üòâ

title: Not earth shattering
review:
Sadly this is where I jump off the Varo train 
I have had Varo for 2 years and loved and raved about them. Now they join the crowded online bank space with nothing special to add. Their no fee overdraft program was stellar and I haven‚Äôt found anyone else in the industry to replicate that. Their new and improved advance program isn‚Äôt any different than the multitude of other payday advance products out there. I hated to switch and was forced into it. They act like any other big bank now. The app is faaaar worse than the previous one navigation and information wise. I‚Äôm moving on.
developerResponse: {'id': 21842294, 'body': "We're really sorry to hear you're upset about the switch to Varo Bank. As we've just received our national banking charter, this enabled us to become a bank where we can now offer our own accounts along with other new and improved features. Varo Money accounts are provided by The Bancorp Bank so the switch is\xa0necessary\xa0and the debit cards are not interchangeable. However, we hear your frustrations and your feedback is taken very seriously as we know there is room for improvement. We're sorry that this experience has led you to consider banking elsewhere but please know that lots of new, great things are to come with Varo Bank. You can see the difference between Varo Bank and Varo Money here:\xa0https://www.varomoney.com/varobankmigration/\xa0-- if you have any questions or further concerns for us, please reach out to us at\xa0appreview@varomoney.com! We're here and happy to help!", 'modified': '2021-03-24T13:31:23Z'}

title: Not as good as it used to be...and they haven‚Äôt been around that long!
review: I‚Äôve been with Varo for a couple of years now and although initially they were great, they are slowly going downhill. Trying to get a hold of customer service is very difficult, checks take unusually long times to process, and they switched up the fine print (on multiple occasions) on their interest rates. I understand they‚Äôre going through some growing pains but waiting over 1 hour to speak to a representative at a bank is unacceptable. Varo felt like it was managed much better when it was under Bancorp Bank.
